roleset.name: court ordered prohibition of a specific action

example.name: ADJ
example.text: And the injunction Judges Miner and Altimari would so readily have granted had New Era sued in time ?

propbank.arg: Judges Miner and Altimari would so readily have granted

example.name: arg1
example.text: In its suit , the consumer agency seeks fines of $ 1,000 per violation of the city 's Consumer Protection Law , costs of investigation , and an injunction to prevent Newmark & Lewis from continuing its allegedly deceptive advertising .

propbank.arg: to prevent Newmark & Lewis from continuing its allegedly deceptive advertising

roleset.note: INJUNCTION-N NOTES: Fleshed out by Julia based on on499-nouns-be. Relation to 'superinjunction.01'. (from injunction.01-n)
